details.test: Phase 1.1: User Progress uses createWithId method
details.details: User progress correctly uses userId as document ID

details.test: Phase 1.2: Quiz Attempt has single timestamp field
details.details: Only submittedAt field present, completedAt removed successfully
createWithId method correctly implemented with setDoc

details.test: Phase 2.2: Security rules match service implementations
details.details: Security rules correctly expect userId as document ID

details.test: Phase 3.1: BaseDatabaseService has comprehensive error handling
details.details: Comprehensive error handling with retry logic and circuit breaker

details.test: Phase 3.2: Timestamp utility exists and is properly structured
details.details: TimestampUtils class and patterns correctly implemented
User and Quiz services use standardized timestamp patterns

details.test: Integration: TypeScript interfaces align with service usage
details.details: QuizAttempt interface properly defined, exported, and used
User progress creation includes all required interface fields
